title: PBE Servers Busy?
body: So 30mins earlier i could get on the PBE, now when i try to log on, it says the servers are busy, someone explain to me what that means and how long it lasts. And if need be, how to fix.

replies.body:
Hey Drunken Bard,

There doesn't appear to be any issues with the PBE servers at this time. Can you confirm whether you're able to log in?

http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe

The PBE was undergoing maintenance that look longer than expected yesterday. Visiting the PBE Service Status page as Wuks suggested is a good idea when you're unable to access the PBE server.

On top of that, I recommend posting PBE-related issues on the PBE Boards here:

- http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/

You'll have a community of PBE testers who may have better context regarding the environment to help you with your inquiries.
